word:
Section Four - The Health Work

                        "Beloved, I wish above all things 
                         that thou mayest prosper and be 
                         in health." 3 John 2. 


          Faithfulness in Health Reform [MANUSCRIPT 
               READ BEFORE THE DELEGATES AT THE GENERAL 
             CONFERENCE, WASHINGTON D. C., MAY 31, 1909.] 


     I am instructed to bear a message to all our people on the subject of health reform, for many have backslidden from their former loyalty to health reform principles.
